The Gemini was just the beginning!

But it was also basically the end of American stuff by me, Titan aside.

But, I will say I am not sure about the thermal blanket.

Edited February 17, 2015 by Beale

Those look fantastic!

I'd say the reason the fabric looks weird, is because it looks like a denim texture. The thermal blanket on the Soyuz/Progress has a lot of vertical-runing creases, and a good sheen.

Good reference image from Cupola:

Bonus points is you change the color of the experimental Soyuz CM fabric to a denim-blue, and set it up on a stars-and-stripes background. The 'Murican-built, 'Soyerzzz' must become a reality. It's sooooo close...

Mianbao should get a white texture like the Shenzhou, with a bright red communist stripe.

I cannot wait for alternate textures. That's honestly got me more hyped than the N-1.

Those look fantastic!

I'd say the reason the fabric looks weird, is because it looks like a denim texture. The thermal blanket on the Soyuz/Progress has a lot of vertical-runing creases, and a good sheen.

Good reference image from Cupola: http://spaceflight.nasa.gov/gallery/images/station/crew-22/hires/s130e009616.jpg

Bonus points is you change the color of the experimental Soyuz CM fabric to a denim-blue, and set it up on a stars-and-stripes background. The 'Murican-built, 'Soyerzzz' must become a reality. It's sooooo close...

Mianbao should get a white texture like the Shenzhou, with a bright red communist stripe.

I cannot wait for alternate textures. That's honestly got me more hyped than the N-1.

Yep, it is literally a denim texture applies.

The type of fabric seen on a Soyuz is very difficult for me... Ehm, I will continue to see what is possible.

I am glad you are hyped! But please, do not expect so many textures at the beginning.

Usually I will make these in a "trickle" releasing my alternates (And hopefully others) as time goes on (The texture repo is your place if you want to get in on this!).
